generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, under a bridge.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian areas are visible on both sides of the road, with curbs separating them from the road surface.
- building: A multi-story building with windows and commercial signs is visible on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees and greenery are visible along the sides of the road and under the bridge.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and the bridge, appearing overcast.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
- car: Several cars are parked on the right side of the road, and one car is visible driving in the distance.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection and under the bridge.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including directional signs and regulatory signs.
- pole: Poles supporting traffic lights and signs are visible along the road.
- terrain: Some grassy areas are visible along the sides of the road, particularly under the bridge.
